body_content.explanation: the largest species (= type) of tyrannosaurus (= a very large, meat-eating dinosaur with large, powerful back legs, small front legs and a long tail):
examples: Tyrannosaurus rex is an icon, a dinosaur known to nearly everyone on the planet.
Birds are actually descendants of the carnivorous dinosaurs like Tyrannosaurus Rex and velociraptors.
"Sue", the world's best preserved tyrannosaurus rex skeleton, was discovered in South Dakota.
